TOMATO PASTE, HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP, MALT VINEGAR, DISTILLED VINEGAR, RAISIN PASTE, SALT, SPICES AND HERBS, LEMON JUICE POWDER (MALTODEXTRIN, LEMON PUREE, CITRIC ACID, SUGAR, LEMON JUICE), NATURAL FLAVOR, CARAMEL COLOR, LESS THAN 1/10 PERCENT SODIUM BENZOATE AND POTASSIUM SORBATE (AS A PRESERVATIVE).
